name: POLYCHEM® Zilch
description: POLYCHEM® Zilch is a mildly alkaline all-purpose cleaner and degreaser. This powerful degreaser is the environmentally preferred solution for all degreasing tasks. A synergistic blend of unique surfactants produces a formula that has the ability to remove soils such as oils, grease, metal working fluids, drawing compounds, polishing and buffing compounds.
